snippet: Jurgen Klinsmann, who coached Germany in 2006, faced significant pressure with the host team, but acknowledged that the strain would be different for Luiz Felipe Scolari.
abstract: Jurgen Klinsmann, who coached Germany's soccer team in 2006, faced significant pressure representing the host team, but acknowledges that the strain would be different for Luiz Felipe Scolari, when Brazil hosts the 2014 World Cup.
lead_paragraph: Jurgen Klinsmann, who coached Germany in 2006, faced significant pressure with the host team, but acknowledged that the strain would be different for Luiz Felipe Scolari.

headline.main: Klinsmann Knows Well the Strains a Host Faces
headline.print_headline: Klinsmann Knows Well The Strains A Host Faces
